reviews.review:
Everything that can objectively be said about Global Offensive has already been said, so I will say this:

The game has given my friends and I hours upon hours of stressful yet bombastic fun, found in few other competitive games. It's free to play, so why not give it a shot?
Если ты не читер ,то тут делать нечего это пиздец
Great game, but it sucks that people who payed only got a badge!
эта игра идеальна для тех кто любит бомбить!
bence güzel bir oyun denemenizi tavsiye ederim
Eh, you could do worse... And better
10/10 Would get running ak47 headshotted again

I very like game.
I go from low rank to even lower rank.
Could use some tweaking with the banning system tho
A classic one! it's still the best
UFAK HATALARI VAR AMA ÇOK  İYİ

very good game when no hakers 
but always hacker so never good game
Топ игра хоть и бесплатная, много говна, а так норм
Охх уж эти PRO MLG Gamer'ы на звании сильвер
This game is awesome also some server pretty nice people here and also some angry dude but tis game is good :)
Feels good to play but I fucking hate Sayan.
A very interesting first person shooter
muito bom mais com o tempo esta falindo

otunda 1600 saatimi harcadım. belki siz bunu okurken 2000 2500 olmuştur. 1 2 el atıp çıkmalık bir oyun. kendinizi rank için kaptırıp oynarsanız sıkıyor. hitbox lar oyun çıktığından beri berbat. onun dışında bir sorunum yok oyunla.
эту игру можно описать как 10 курв из 10
The unmatched king of competitive first-person shooters.
çok kötü  herşe ban veriyo bedava olunca
This game is sh!t but it's good sh!t

[b] SETTING [/b]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b] Resolution : [/b] 1024x768 4:3 Stretched 60Hz
[b] Windows-Sensitivity : [/b] 6/11
[b] DPI : [/b] 1000
[b] Mouse Sensitivity : [/b] 1.2
[b] Zoom Sensitivity : [/b] 1.2
[b] Launch Option : [/b] -novid -freq 75 -full -w 1024 -h 768 -tickrate 128 -console -high
[b] Config : [/b] https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MXXNcf71Drp3Gcq85qf_iyILJgQyH2lb/view 

[b] CROSSHAIR [/b] 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
cl_crosshair_drawoutline "0"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio "0.35"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_innermod "1"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_outermod "0.5"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitdist "7"
cl_crosshair_outlinethickness "1"
cl_crosshair_sniper_show_normal_inaccuracy "0"
cl_crosshair_sniper_width "1"
cl_crosshair_t "0"
cl_crosshairalpha "255"
cl_crosshaircolor "4"
cl_crosshaircolor_b "50"
cl_crosshaircolor_g "250"
cl_crosshaircolor_r "50"
cl_crosshairdot "0"
cl_crosshairgap "-1.5"
cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue "0"
cl_crosshairscale "600"
cl_crosshairsize "2"
cl_crosshairstyle "4"
cl_crosshairthickness "0"
cl_crosshairusealpha "1"
cl_fixedcrosshairgap "3"

[b] VIEWMODEL [/b]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
cl_viewmodel_shift_left_amt "0.500000"
cl_viewmodel_shift_right_amt "0.250000"

viewmodel_fov "68"
viewmodel_offset_x "2.5"
viewmodel_offset_y "0"
viewmodel_offset_z "-1.5"
viewmodel_presetpos "3"
viewmodel_recoil "0"

cl_bob_lower_amt "21.000000"
cl_bobamt_lat "0.100000"
cl_bobamt_vert "0.10000"
cl_bobcycle "0.98"
